gate.learning
Class EvaluationMeasuresComputation

java.lang.Object
  gate.learning.EvaluationMeasuresComputation

public class EvaluationMeasuresComputation
extends Object

Store the results for computing the F-measures for binary classification problem (or one label of multi-class problems). The measures include precision, recall and F1. It has exact results as well as lenient results counting partial matches.

          Number of exact matches.
